author: gralf
post_text: October 8, 2017 at 9:10 AM#1Hi!I need to add a specific device (e.g. console, 3D, VPU etc.) to netconfig by commandline/macro.I've done:Codecd netconfigcd consolestore "myConsole"The console "myConsole" is added to the list of consoles with IP 0.0.0.0.Now I'm stuck changing the IP by command.I've triedCodeassign "myConsole" /IPETHERCON1(ETH0)="192.168.0.1"This does not report any error but does not change the IP, too.I can change any other option with assign, but how to change the IP?Any ideas?ThanksGralf
title: Add device to netconfig by macro/commandline
